requests.header: Where can I get old car wheels?
requests.content: I have a big recycle project at school I need some old car wheels for it

comments.content: this is the worst post i have ever seenn in my life. just ever.

requests.content: I built a castle only by things I wanted to throw away, I am so proud of myself!!

guide.header: A guide on how to build a wooden dog kennel
guide.content: Take a discarded wood and glue, and stick the pieces of wood with glue.

guide.header: Who knows how to make a hat from pieces of fabric?
guide.content: I have a lot of pieces of fabric at home and I have to make a hat for the show tomorrow, can you help?

locations.header: Does anyone know where there is a place that recycles iron?
locations.content: I work in a factory that throws away a lot of iron due to mistakes by the workers, and we don't know where to recycle all the iron. Can you help?

locations.header: Can someone please help me recycle a lot of plastic bottles?
locations.content: I need to recycle a lot of plastic bottles but I can't lift them all alone
A new cycle area has opened in Ramat Gan, the place is open from 8 am to 10 pm

furniture.header: Does anyone know where they sell a second hand closet in Haifa?
furniture.content: I moved to Haifa and I urgently need a closet to put my clothes in.

furniture.header: Does anyone want a second hand closet?
furniture.content: I bought a new closet for my house and I don't use the old one, if anyone lives in Haifa and needs it, let me know

electric.header: Where can I buy a cheap second hand TV in Tel Aviv?
electric.content: I need to buy a cheap TV in Tel Aviv, I have a budget of NIS 300, can anyone help me?

electric.header: Where can I buy a cheap second hand Phone in Tel Aviv?
electric.content: My phone is broken and I have to buy a new one, but I don't have much money, so I want to buy the phone second hand.
I am selling an IPhone 10 for two thousand shekels, if anyone wants to it reply to this post.

clothing.header: A new second hand clothing store is opening!!
clothing.content: I am opening a new clothing store, the store is in Metula and it is open from 7 am to 9 pm.

clothing.header: Anyone need Nike shoes size 47 (European size)?
clothing.content: I have a black Nike shoe that I want to throw away if anyone wants it please respond, after a week I will delete the post.

clothing.header: My second-hand clothing store is closing
clothing.content: I'm closing my thrift store, and I'm opening a new one somewhere else. I will give details later.

general.content: On Sunday at 2 in the afternoon we will go to Dor beach and we will clean it, please don't be late!
I walked today at 5 o'clock in Ofakim Park and was amazed to see how dirty it is and looks bad, the municipality must clean the park!

tips.header: I need a tip about menstruation
tips.content: I feel like I'm polluting the environment and I don't understand why, can someone write me tips that will help me protect the environment more?

tips.header: A tip for protecting the environment
tips.content: My tip is very simple, all you have to do is instead of eating with disposable utensils, eat with reusable utensils and save yourself a lot of throwing plastic in the trash.

tips.header: Washing dishes or using a dishwasher?
tips.content: I'm debating which can help the environment more: Washing dishes or using a dishwasher. Can someone help me?
